title: redundant failonerror=true in (contrib|modules)-crawl elements
description:
Attached patch proposes to only provide the attribute when it differs from the default.


	contrib-crawl macrodef is in solr/common-build.xml
	modules-crawl macrodef is in lucene/common-build.xml
	MacroDef ant documentation is at http://ant.apache.org/manual/Tasks/macrodef.html
